name: Next King
description:
This place is the "castle of the kings".
Having arrived in a world you have never seen before, your goal is to obtain the eight cores. They are said to be necessary to make your wishes come true. You can't remember, but what was your wish?

This game is a RPG. Play with mouse only.

Choose your hero.



It is possible to make monsters your allies.


Item synthesis.


There are puzzles in the game, and by solving them you will be able to advance.


A screen resolution - 1280*720 or 1920*1080
